parameters: Welcome to the tower of light.
Welcome to the tower of light.
The solar shrine is currently closed to
visitors, at the request of the Grandmaster.
The Solar shrine. I haven't actually been to
this place before. If I remember correctly,
every time the leader changes here, their
guidance for worshippers does as well.
Quite a lot of the residents of Willowbend
worship various Solar deities, and come here
That makes sense given the agricultural focus
Even many Kheltari worship sun gods, though
our shrines aren't as elaborate as this.
I wonder where the shard is? One way to find
